entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of snow. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of snow in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 26 February 2023
